text: Piet Fransen (5 July 1936 â€“ 2 August 2015) was a Dutch footballer who played as a midfielder. He made his debut for the Netherlands in an October 1964 FIFA World Cup qualification match against Albania and has earned a total of 6 caps, scoring 1 goal.National team stats - Voetbalstats He represented his country in 3 FIFA World Cup qualification matches. Fransen died on 2 August 2015 in Groningen, aged 79.FC Groningen-icoon Fransen overleden (79) - Voetbal International ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Dutch footballers Category:Sportspeople from Groningen (city)
title: Piet Fransen
